trans-unit.source: Establishes a design-time service that manages the collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem"></xref> objects for components.
trans-unit.target: Estabelece um serviço de tempo de design que gerencia a coleção de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem"> </xref> objetos para os componentes.

trans-unit.source: The DesignerActionService class is responsible for managing the collection of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> objects for each instance of a component that exists on a form at design time.
trans-unit.target: A classe DesignerActionService é responsável por gerenciar a coleção de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem>objetos para cada instância de um componente que existe em um formulário em tempo de design.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem>

trans-unit.source: This class enables a direct push model of item creation, and is primarily intended for use by design-time tool developers, although it can also be used by component and custom control developers.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe permite que um modelo de push direto de criação do item e é usado principalmente para uso por desenvolvedores de ferramentas de tempo de design, embora também possa ser usado pelo componente e desenvolvedores de controle personalizado.

trans-unit.source: Design-time tool developers will need to determine the list of items to display for a component and determine when this list changes.
trans-unit.target: Os desenvolvedores da ferramenta de tempo de design serão necessário determinar a lista de itens a serem exibidos para um componente e determinar quando essa lista muda.

trans-unit.source: They may also create add-ins that operate in conjunction with smart tag panel objects.
trans-unit.target: Eles também podem criar suplementos que operam em conjunto com objetos do painel de marca inteligente.

trans-unit.source: Advanced component developers may need to dynamically control the items associated with a component, thus replacing or supplementing the standard pull model.
trans-unit.target: Avançado desenvolvedores talvez precise controlar dinamicamente os itens associados a um componente, assim, substituir ou que complementam o modelo de pull padrão do componente.

trans-unit.source: For example, panel commands can be altered depending on the context of their use and the design-time state of the component.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, os comandos de painel podem ser alterados dependendo do contexto de seu uso e o estado de tempo de design do componente.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The DesignerActionService is actually the driving service behind both the push and pull models; however, in the latter case it operates implicitly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > DesignerActionService o é, na verdade, o um serviço por trás de modelos de push e pull; no entanto, no último caso ele opera implicitamente.

trans-unit.source: DesignerActionService provides a straightforward interface for accessing and manipulating the items for each component, including the following methods and events: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Contains%2A> method determines whether the DesignerActionService is currently managing a particular component.
trans-unit.target: DesignerActionService fornece uma interface simples para acessar e manipular os itens para cada componente, incluindo os seguintes métodos e eventos: - o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Contains%2A>método determina se o DesignerActionService está atualmente Gerenciando um determinado componente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A> method supports the enumeration of the lists of items.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A>método dá suporte à enumeração de listas de itens.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> method allows adding a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> to the set of existing items for a component instance.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>método permite adicionar um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>ou <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>ao conjunto de itens existentes para uma instância do componente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A> method removes one or all of the item lists associated with a component.
trans-unit.target: Em contraste, o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>método Remove uma ou todas as listas de item associadas ao componente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> method represents the direct push model of associating panel items with a component.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>método representa o modelo de push direto de associar os itens do painel um componente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the pull model relies on overriding the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property of the designer class for that component.
trans-unit.target: Por outro lado, o modelo de pull depende substituindo o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>propriedade da classe do designer para esse componente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: The design environment is responsible for adding these items into the current DesignerActionService when a component is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O ambiente de design é responsável por adicionar esses itens para o DesignerActionService atual quando um componente é criado na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Contains%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Clear%2A> methods only consider or affect push-model items.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Contains%2A>, e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Clear%2A>métodos só considere ou afetam itens de modelo de push.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Clear%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Contains%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event indicates when the collection of items changes for a component.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>evento indica quando a coleção de itens é alterado para um componente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: Because it is often desirable to use some of the same panel items in both the component's design-time shortcut menu and its panel, a large degree of interoperability exists between <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> objects and designer verbs.
trans-unit.target: Como geralmente é desejável usar alguns dos mesmos itens de painel no menu de atalho de tempo de design do componente e seu painel, um alto grau de interoperabilidade existe entre <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem>objetos e verbos do designer.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem>

trans-unit.source: If a component designer does not explicitly specify a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> (that is, it does not contain an overridden <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property), then a list will be created from existing designer verbs.
trans-unit.target: Se um designer de componentes não especificar explicitamente um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>(ou seja, ele não contém um substituído <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>propriedade), em seguida, será criada uma lista de verbos do designer existentes.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: These verbs are specified by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Esses verbos são especificados pelo <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, an internal verb list class is used to contain the collection of verb item panel entries.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, uma classe de lista verbo interno é usada para conter a coleção de entradas de painel de item do verbo.

trans-unit.source: If you want a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> to be used both as a panel entry and a design-time shortcut menu entry, then you can set the `includeAsDesignerVerb` parameter in the item's constructor.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>a ser usado como uma entrada no painel e como uma entrada de menu de atalho de tempo de design, você poderá definir o `includeAsDesignerVerb` parâmetro no construtor do item.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> to control the display of your designer's <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Usar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>para controlar a exibição de seu designer <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A service provider is necessary for monitoring selection and component changes.
trans-unit.target: Um provedor de serviço é necessário para a seleção e alterações de componente de monitoramento.

trans-unit.source: It is expected to support the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> types.
trans-unit.target: Espera-se para dar suporte a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>tipos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> class uses an internal table to manage components and their associated <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> smart tags.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>classe usa uma tabela interna para gerenciar componentes e seus respectivos <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>marcas inteligentes.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>

trans-unit.source: Typically, component developers will not need to create an instance of this class; instead, they can acquire an existing instance through a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.GetService%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, os desenvolvedores de componentes não serão necessário criar uma instância dessa classe; em vez disso, eles podem adquirir uma instância existente por meio de uma chamada para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.GetService%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.GetService%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The service provider for the current design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: O provedor de serviço para o ambiente de tempo de design atual.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> to the current collection of managed smart tags.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> à coleção atual de marcas inteligentes gerenciadas.

trans-unit.source: The Add method represents the push model of adding smart tag items.
trans-unit.target: O método Add representa o modelo de push de adição de itens de marcas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: The alternate pull model relies on overriding the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property in the designer for the corresponding component.
trans-unit.target: O modelo de pull alternativo depende substituindo o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>propriedade no designer do componente correspondente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, the lists to be added are scanned for any <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem.IncludeAsDesignerVerb%2A> property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando este método é chamado, a lista a serem adicionados é verificada para qualquer <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>com o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem.IncludeAsDesignerVerb%2A>propriedade definida como `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem.IncludeAsDesignerVerb%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>

trans-unit.source: These items are added to the list of designer verbs for this component, through a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Esses itens são adicionados à lista de verbos do designer para este componente, por meio de uma chamada para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Smart tags are managed on a component instance basis.
trans-unit.target: Marcas inteligentes são gerenciadas em uma base de instância do componente.

trans-unit.source: The managed collection may contain duplicate entries.
trans-unit.target: A coleção gerenciada pode conter entradas duplicadas.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Este método gera o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>evento.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> to associate the smart tags with.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> para associar as marcas inteligentes com.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> that contains the new smart tag items to be added.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> que contém os novos itens de marca inteligente a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: One or both of the parameters are <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um ou ambos os parâmetros são <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> to the current collection of managed smart tags.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> à coleção atual de marcas inteligentes gerenciadas.

trans-unit.source: The Add method represents the push model of adding smart tag items.
trans-unit.target: O método Add representa o modelo de push de adição de itens de marcas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: The alternate pull model relies on overriding the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property in the designer for the corresponding component.
trans-unit.target: O modelo de pull alternativo depende substituindo o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>propriedade no designer do componente correspondente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, the lists to be added are scanned for any <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem.IncludeAsDesignerVerb%2A> property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando este método é chamado, a lista a serem adicionados é verificada para qualquer <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>com o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem.IncludeAsDesignerVerb%2A>propriedade definida como `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem.IncludeAsDesignerVerb%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>

trans-unit.source: These items are added to the list of designer verbs for this component, through a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Esses itens são adicionados à lista de verbos do designer para este componente, por meio de uma chamada para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Smart tags are managed on a component instance basis.
trans-unit.target: Marcas inteligentes são gerenciadas em uma base de instância do componente.

trans-unit.source: The managed collection may contain duplicate entries.
trans-unit.target: A coleção gerenciada pode conter entradas duplicadas.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Este método gera o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>evento.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> to associate the smart tags with.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> para associar as marcas inteligentes com.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> that contains the new smart tag items to be added.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> que contém os novos itens de marca inteligente a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: One or both of the parameters are <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um ou ambos os parâmetros são <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases all components from management and clears all push-model smart tag lists.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os componentes de gerenciamento e limpa todas as listas de marca inteligente do modelo de push.

trans-unit.source: The Clear method empties the internal table used to store information about components and their push-model smart tag lists.
trans-unit.target: O método Clear esvazia a tabela interna usada para armazenar informações sobre componentes e suas listas de marca inteligente do modelo de push.

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Because this method affects all components managed by the current service, and not just the current component, this method should be used judiciously.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Porque esse método afeta todos os componentes gerenciados pelo serviço atual e não apenas o componente atual, esse método deve ser usado criteriosamente.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the design-time tool developer uses it when resetting a design surface.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o desenvolvedor da ferramenta de design usa quando redefinir uma superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: Component developers should use one of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A> methods instead to remove individual smart tag items or lists.
trans-unit.target: Os desenvolvedores de componentes devem usar um do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>métodos em vez disso, para remover a marca inteligente individual de itens ou lista.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event is raised for each component that was previously managed by the current service.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>é gerado para cada componente que foi anteriormente gerenciado pelo serviço atual.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current smart tag service manages the action lists for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o serviço de marca inteligente atual gerencia as listas de ação para o componente especificado.

trans-unit.source: The Contains method only recognizes push-model smart tags, which are associated to a component with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método contém reconhece apenas marcas inteligentes do modelo de push, que são associadas a um componente com o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Although there is no structural limitation on the number of concurrent <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> instances created by a design-time tool, typically only a single instance of the service is created per design surface.
trans-unit.target: Embora não haja nenhuma limitação estrutural no número de unidades simultâneas <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>instâncias criadas por uma ferramenta de tempo de design, normalmente apenas uma única instância do serviço é criada por superfície de design.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> to search for.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> para pesquisar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the component is managed by the current service; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o componente é gerenciado pelo serviço atual; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: comp is .
trans-unit.target: compis .

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> is removed or added for any component.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> foi removido ou adicionado para qualquer componente.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the set of specialized classes associated with the DesignerActionListsChanged event.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra o conjunto de classes especializadas associado ao evento DesignerActionListsChanged.

trans-unit.source: |Specialized type|Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs>|Adds information specific to smart tag list management.
trans-unit.target: | Especializado tipo | Descrição | |----------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs>| Adiciona informações específicas para o gerenciamento da lista de marcas inteligentes.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: This class is specialized from <xref:System.EventArgs>.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler>|Connects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs> with its handler.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedType>|Denotes whether a list has been added or removed.| For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Essa classe é especializada do <xref:System.EventArgs>. | | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler>| Conecta-se a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs>com seu manipulador. | | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedType>| Indica se uma lista foi adicionada ou removida. | Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler> </xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados pelo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method is the implementation of the only method mandated by the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: O método Dispose é a implementação do método somente exigida pelo <xref:System.IDisposable>interface.</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: Call this method when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>.
trans-unit.target: Chame este método quando tiver terminado de usar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>

trans-unit.source: It performs two main actions: - Removes the current service from the list of available services in the design environment through a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer.RemoveService%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ele executa duas ações principais:-remove o serviço atual da lista de serviços disponíveis no ambiente de design através de uma chamada para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer.RemoveService%2A>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer.RemoveService%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Unsubscribes to component change events from the associated <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> interface.
trans-unit.target: -Cancela a inscrição para eventos de alteração de componente de associado <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>interface.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar Dispose quando terminar de usar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O método Dispose deixa a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>em um estado inutilizável.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar Dispose, você deve liberar todas as referências para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>para o coletor de lixo possa recuperar a memória que o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>estava ocupando.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementar um método Dispose](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sempre chamada Dispose antes de liberar sua última referência a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está usando não serão liberados até que o coletor de lixo chame o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>do objeto `Finalize` método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService"> </xref> e, opcionalmente, libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Dispose%2A> method is the implementation of the only method mandated by the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Dispose%2A>método é a implementação do método somente exigida pelo <xref:System.IDisposable>interface.</xref:System.IDisposable> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call this method when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>.
trans-unit.target: Chame este método quando tiver terminado de usar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>

trans-unit.source: It performs two main actions: - Removes the current service from the list of available services in the design environment through a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer.RemoveService%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ele executa duas ações principais:-remove o serviço atual da lista de serviços disponíveis no ambiente de design através de uma chamada para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer.RemoveService%2A>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer.RemoveService%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Unsubscribes to component change events from the associated <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> interface.
trans-unit.target: -Cancela a inscrição para eventos de alteração de componente de associado <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>interface.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo público `Dispose()` método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`invoca o protegido `Dispose(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro é `true`, esse método libera todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>referências.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama o `Dispose()` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of smart tag item lists associated with a component.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a coleção de listas de itens de marcas inteligentes associadas a um componente.

trans-unit.source: The GetComponentActions method is equivalent to a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%28System.ComponentModel.IComponent%2CSystem.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType%29> method using a `type` parameter of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>.
trans-unit.target: O método GetComponentActions é equivalente a uma chamada para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%28System.ComponentModel.IComponent%2CSystem.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType%29>usando o método um `type` parâmetro de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%28System.ComponentModel.IComponent%2CSystem.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType%29>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the collection returned will contain both the push and pull lists of smart tags.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, a coleção retornada conterá as listas por push e pull de marcas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> is the union of item lists added through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> methods and also the lists obtained from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet> instance obtained from the component’s site.
trans-unit.target: Retornado <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>é a união das listas de itens adicionados por meio de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>métodos e também as listas obtido a partir o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet>instância obtido do site do componente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>

trans-unit.source: The component that the smart tags are associated with.
trans-unit.target: O componente que as marcas inteligentes associadas.

trans-unit.source: The collection of smart tags for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de marcas inteligentes para o componente especificado.

trans-unit.source: comp is .
trans-unit.target: compis .

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of smart tag item lists of the specified type associated with a component.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a coleção de marcas inteligentes listas de itens do tipo especificado associado ao componente.

trans-unit.source: This version of the overloaded <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A> method filters on the `type` parameter, which can have one of the following values.
trans-unit.target: Esta versão do sobrecarregados <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A>método filtra o `type` parâmetro, que pode ter um dos valores a seguir.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A>

trans-unit.source: |Value|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>|All associated smart tags.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>|Pull-model smart tags only.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>|Push-model smart tags only.| If the associated designer for a component does not supply a pull-model smart tag list, then the GetComponentActions method will instead use the designer's design-time shortcut menu items from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: | Valor | Descrição | |-----------|-----------------| | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>| Todas as marcas inteligentes de associadas. | | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>| Modelo de pull inteligente somente marcas. | | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>| Modelo de push inteligentes somente marcas. | Se o designer associado para um componente não fornece uma lista de marcas inteligentes do modelo de pull, o método GetComponentActions usará em vez disso, os itens de menu de atalho de tempo de design do designer do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>

trans-unit.source: The component that the smart tags are associated with.
trans-unit.target: O componente que as marcas inteligentes associadas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType"></xref> to filter the associated smart tags with.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType"> </xref> para filtrar as marcas inteligentes associadas com.

trans-unit.source: The collection of smart tags of the specified type for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de marcas inteligentes do tipo especificado para o componente especificado.

trans-unit.source: comp is .
trans-unit.target: compis .

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the pull-model smart tags associated with a component.
trans-unit.target: Recupera as marcas inteligentes do modelo de pull associadas ao componente.

trans-unit.source: The GetComponentDesignerActions method is a helper method for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O método GetComponentDesignerActions é um método auxiliar para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A>métodos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A>

trans-unit.source: GetComponentDesignerActions searches for pull-model smart tags of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>, and then adds these to the supplied `actionLists` collection.
trans-unit.target: Pesquisas de GetComponentDesignerActions para o modelo de pull inteligente marcas do tipo <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>e, em seguida, adiciona esses para fornecido `actionLists` coleção.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>

trans-unit.source: If the component's developer does not explicitly supply a collection of smart tags through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property of its designer, this method will reuse the design-time shortcut menu entries, which are obtained through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A> property of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Se o desenvolvedor do componente não fornecer explicitamente uma coleção de marcas inteligentes por meio de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>propriedade de seu designer, esse método reutilizará as entradas de menu de atalho de tempo de design, que são obtidas por meio de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A>propriedade do designer de.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: The component that the smart tags are associated with.
trans-unit.target: O componente que as marcas inteligentes associadas.

trans-unit.source: The collection to add the associated smart tags to.
trans-unit.target: A coleção para adicionar as marcas inteligentes associadas ao.

trans-unit.source: One or both of the parameters are <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um ou ambos os parâmetros são <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the push-model smart tags associated with a component.
trans-unit.target: Recupera as marcas inteligentes do modelo de push associadas ao componente.

trans-unit.source: The GetComponentServiceActions method is a helper method for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O método GetComponentServiceActions é um método auxiliar para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A>métodos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A>

trans-unit.source: It searches for push-model smart tags of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>, and then adds these to the supplied `actionLists` collection.
trans-unit.target: Ele procura as marcas inteligentes do tipo de modelo de push <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>e, em seguida, adiciona esses para fornecido `actionLists` coleção.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>

trans-unit.source: The component that the smart tags are associated with.
trans-unit.target: O componente que as marcas inteligentes associadas.

trans-unit.source: The collection to add the associated smart tags to.
trans-unit.target: A coleção para adicionar as marcas inteligentes associadas ao.

trans-unit.source: One or both of the parameters are <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um ou ambos os parâmetros são <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified smart tag list from all components managed by the current service.
trans-unit.target: Remove a lista de marca inteligente de todos os componentes gerenciados pelo serviço atual.

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A> method is typically used by design tool developers, because component developers typically do not know what other components exist in the current design space.
trans-unit.target: Esta versão do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>método normalmente é usado por desenvolvedores de ferramentas de design, porque os desenvolvedores de componentes normalmente não sabe que outros componentes existem no espaço de design atual.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: If successful, this method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Se for bem-sucedido, esse método gerará o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>evento.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: The list of smart tags to be removed.
trans-unit.target: A lista de marcas inteligentes a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: actionList is .
trans-unit.target: actionListis .

trans-unit.source: Removes all the smart tag lists associated with the specified component.
trans-unit.target: Remove todas as listas de marcas inteligentes associadas ao componente especificado.

trans-unit.source: If successful, the Remove method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Se for bem-sucedido, o método Remove gera o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>evento.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: The component to disassociate the smart tags from.
trans-unit.target: O componente de desassociar as marcas inteligentes do.

trans-unit.source: comp is .
trans-unit.target: compis .

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified smart tag list from the specified component.
trans-unit.target: Remove a lista de marca inteligente especificado do componente especificado.

trans-unit.source: If successful, the Remove method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Se for bem-sucedido, o método Remove gera o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>evento.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: The component to disassociate the smart tags from.
trans-unit.target: O componente de desassociar as marcas inteligentes do.

trans-unit.source: The smart tag list to remove.
trans-unit.target: A lista de marcas inteligentes para remover.

trans-unit.source: One or both of the parameters are <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um ou ambos os parâmetros são <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
